title: Betrayer
notes:
Ran it on medium settings performance was solid however when initially starting the game the menu will flicker enabling vsync fixes the menu flickering
 
when entering the game there will be slight texture flickering when looking around this can be fixed by disabling anti-aliasing in the graphics menu 

there seems to be minor graphical glitch on the buildings in the form of tiny flickering textures however it does not effect the gameplaty enough to make it unplayable everything else runs smooth as butter i played for about an hour

Playable, but performance isn't great and there are various graphical glitches. Anti-aliasing settings cause intermittent screen flicker unless set to "off", and blocky white spots can be seen when looking at dark areas up close.
title: Betrayer
